reqs:
Co-reqs: One of MATH 320, MATH 322.
CROSSLISTED WITH MATH 537/101.
description: Divisibility, congruences, Diophantine equations, arithmetic functions, quadratic reciprocity, advanced topics. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
